entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #35642
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Blazor download size regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #35641
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Detecting when attributes are put on a method called by a lambda instead of the lambda itself #35638
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor RunAOTCompilation fails during BlazorWebAssembly.ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.Execute #35633
    area-blazor
  • Single file build time regression: json, json, json, proxy-yarp #35629
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Startup improvement: single_query #35628
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Startup regression: json, plaintext #35627
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Startup regression: connectionclose, endpoint, fortunes, fortunes_ef #35626
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, json_nodejs, plaintext #35625
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, plaintext #35624
    Perf, perf-regression
  • Update Omnisharp to latest #35622
    task, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.languageserver, feature-razor.vs, feature-razor.vscode, 17.0-Preview4
  • Add cs-bytes and sc-bytes to the W3CLogger #35614
    area-runtime
  • W3CLogging "time" not precise enough, leading to "time-taken" being significantly wrong #35613
    area-runtime
  • Slow File download speed using HTTP.sys #35612
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Duplicate, Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, Status: Resolved
  • [Blazor] Availability of User in Startup #35611
    area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • "DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement" is not respecting "AuthorizationOptions.InvokeHandlersAfterFailure" #35610
    area-security
  • [SPA] Using floating versions on the SPA repo in eng/Versions.props #35608
    area-mvc, feature-spa
  • Blazor preserving prerended state does not seem to work #35605
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-prerendering, 6.0-rc2
  • Wrong formatting within nested InputSelect component #35604
    area-razor.tooling
  • VS Code: Open Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml and type " @da ", error info is no appear in PROBLEMS window. #35603
    area-razor.tooling
  • ProtectKeysWithCertificate(thumbprint) does NOT Throw an Exception if the Certificate is Inaccessible due to Permissions #35602
    area-security
  • VS Code: Open _Layout.cshtml file and type "@{" in the <head> tag, the string "__o" is automatically added. #35601
    area-razor.tooling
  • Untrusted localhost certificate used by Visual Studio to debug Blazor prevents WASM Debugging #35618
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts

Closed

  • Blazor: PreRender WASM: PageTitle/HeadContent not updated on publish #35363
    Done, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Stress tests for HTTP/3 #28430
    task, area-runtime, severity-major, affected-medium, HTTP3, Next sprint planning
  • [HTTP/3] Kestrel closes connection too soon #35470
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3
  • Database Distributed Cache #35220
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-runtime, api-suggestion, Status: No Recent Activity, feature-caching
  • Startup regression: mapaction #35165
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef, mvc #35173
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup regression: https, mapaction, plaintext #35191
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #35214
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup regression: plaintext #35235
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #35236
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Perf regression: plaintext_actix #35172
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #35190
    Perf, perf-regression, area-perf
  • SignalR client NPM package corrupt #35494
    area-signalr
  • Blazor Debugging not working #33731
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Needs: Attention :wave:, feature-blazor-debugging, Discussions
  • Blazor Web Assembly hot reload is very unstable #35352
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-commandlinetools, Status: No Recent Activity, Status: Resolved, feature-dotnetwatch, feature-hot-reload
  • React to quic adding ReadsCompleted #35399
    area-runtime, HTTP3, 6.0-rc1
  • InvariantGlobalization 6.0 bug when component have EditForm #35324
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Status: No Recent Activity, feature-hot-reload
  • Allow external libraries to extend Results #35508
    api-approved, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Minimal hosting - duplicate routes defined only found at runtime #35262
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Duplicate, feature-routing, Status: Resolved, area-web-frameworks
  • Can not reference RCL assets using assembly name #35587
    question, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: By Design, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-css-isolation
  • Blazor WASM: Upgrading to .NET 6 preview 7 breaks VS 2019 Preview #35606

Updated

  • VS 2022 Preview 3.1 Template creates Minimal API for Blazor Server Hosted Project #35577
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-runtime
  • Ambiguous Map method with Minimal #35323
    External, api-ready-for-review, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3 end-to-end signoff for .NET 6 #35531
    area-runtime, HTTP3, 6.0-rc2
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • SignalR client callback not firing in Blazor WebAssembly client IF client application was published AND callback parameter type has an Immutable collection property #35598
    area-blazor
  • Minimal Actions - array support in method signatures from querystring binding #32516
    enhancement, area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, Backlog
  • Hot reload script 'aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js' connection issues #34975
    bug, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Not all default services are added to WebApplicationBuilder.Services #34825
    Priority:3, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Authorized minimal APIs should be easily callable from Postman #34546
    Docs, area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Html.ActionLink() returns incorrect URL when Minimal Action with Name metadata in use #35592
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Add support for using endpoint metadata to add tags to an endpoint for use in OpenAPI descriptions #35310
    Priority:1, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Formatting @code block C# with extra block syntax can break formatting #34320
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, feature-razor.formatting, 17.0-Preview4
  • OnTypeFormatting "on enter" can result in funky C# formatting #34319
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.formatting, 17.0-Preview4
  • VSCode - Razor extension crashes when directory contains plus sign #33144
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Support Blazor properly for All ASP.Net Identity Scaffolded pages (i.e., not Razor Pages) #35551
    area-identity
  • Async errors and warnings in Razor Pages @functions blocks #20055
    bug, affected-few, severity-major, area-razor.compiler, nullable, Backlog
  • Uint8Array created by byte[] deserialization in javascript has incorrect buffer property byteLength #35597
    bug, investigate, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-jsinterop, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve HTTP/2 performance by using Channels #30235
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP2, Backlog
  • Allow more failure details for AuthZ handlers #35319
    area-security, api-approved, 6.0-rc1
  • JsonPatchDocument should use System.Text.Json in ASP.NET vNext #24333
    enhancement, area-mvc, feature-JSONPatch, affected-few, severity-minor, Backlog
  • Refused to load _framework/aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js after upgrading visual studio to 16.10.0 #33068
    investigate, area-commandlinetools, Backlog
  • Pause and resume Blazor applications #27576
    enhancement, area-blazor, affected-most, severity-major, User Story, design-proposal, Bottom Up Work, feature-circuit-lifecycle, Backlog
  • `Components.E2ETests.ServerTransportsTest`s Failing (not quarantined) #35481
    test-failure, area-blazor, blazor-server, 6.0-rc2
  • Return the path in error handling #35596
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • ODE (Safe handle has been closed) after IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping callback is called on HttpSysServer #35491
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • Subclassing Startup from StartupBase throws NotSupportedException #35502
    Docs, area-runtime, feature-hosting, 6.0.0
  • [SignalR] Provide a way for Azure SignalR to read HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions #35544
    area-signalr
  • Unhandled exception in c++ client's hub_connection::stop() method due to cancellation logic #35515
    area-signalr, signalr-client-c++
  • APEX fails in some LSP scenarios #32623
    task, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, razor.tooling-fundamentals, Razor.Tooling
  • Having C# block comments can cause C# colorization to Debug.Fail #33895
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Add BatchSize to W3CLoggerOptions #35545
    area-runtime, api-suggestion
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35478
    area-runtime, api-approved, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1
  • `{Date, Time}Only` Querystring building APIs for Blazor #35567
    Working, enhancement, area-blazor, api-approved, 6.0-rc1
  • Throws MessagePack.MessagePackSerializationException when simultaneously sending same message to multiple connected clients #35595
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr
  • Support custom error messages for optionality via nullability feature #35501
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Blazor: InputFile out of memory #35583
    area-blazor, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • Inconsistent URL decoding of HttpRequest.Path with percent-encoded characters #30655
    bug, investigate, Docs, area-runtime, Backlog
  • Multi-level inheritance with code-behind #35509
    investigate, area-blazor, Backlog
  • Blazor Hosted - Pass model to Server with NavigationManager #35530
    Docs, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Disposing InputFile BrowserFileStream does not dispose JSStreamReference #35540
    investigate, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • .Net 6 p7 Wasm publised throws Blazor detected a change in the application's culture that is not supported with the current project configuration #35550
    investigate, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Remove continueOnBuildError for components e2e #35565
    task, test-failure, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Web.config transformations not working when deploying Blazor WebAssembly application to Production and Staging Environments #35584
    enhancement, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-deployment, Backlog
  • Blazor Hosted WebAssembly, Failing to resolve the route. #35589
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    area-blazor, Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to model binding & routing #34591
    enhancement, area-mvc, feature-Model-Binding, area-blazor, Backlog
  • Change applied to Blazor WebAssembly app using .NET Hot Reload don't show up after adding binding code #34446
    bug, Working, External, area-blazor, feature-hot-reload, 6.0-rc2
  • Specific component for dealing with large amounts of text data (InputTextArea) #30291
    Working, enhancement, area-blazor, severity-blocking, affected-medium, feature-blazor-server-experience, 6.0-rc2
  • Unable to build components #35192
    area-infrastructure
  • In Blazor WebAssembly, allow dynamic query string parameters when redirecting to IDP #33784
    enhancement, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-wasm-auth, Backlog
  • `IDataProtectionKeyContext.DataProtectionKeys` property should have `set` accessor #35599
    area-dataprotection
  • Error in .NET 6 SDK when building a Blazor Wasm project that transitive referencing a Razor Class Library package built by .NET 5 SDK that contains static web assets #35590
    question, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-static-web-assets
  • Model binding fails with FormatException if dictionary key is numeric type and value is missing from POST #35594
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-razor-views
  • Investigate behavior of Blazor Server on mobile when switching apps #26985
    bug, area-blazor, affected-most, severity-major, blazor-server, feature-blazor-server-experience, feature-circuit-lifecycle, Backlog
  • Need help with my account #35487
    Needs: Author Feedback, Status: No Recent Activity
  • ASP.NET Core *. StaticWebAssets.xml get unexpectedly deleted in the dependent project's output directory on build #35345
    area-mvc, Needs: Attention :wave:, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, feature-static-web-assets, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor - BrotliCompress msbuild task duplicate processing of files - causes lock exceptions #29529
    bug, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, affected-few, severity-major, feature-razor-sdk, 6.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] IUserIdProvider's GetUserId has no async option #35417
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr
  • ConnectionState.getNextInvocationId() on a null object reference #35444
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr, Status: No Recent Activity

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor input component support when EditContext is not supplied #35640
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix ambiguous Map method with minimal #35639
    area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] Update docker container to mcr #35637
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Update docker container to mcr #35636
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35635
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #35634
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Backport minimal action API changes to 6.0-rc1 #35632
  • Fix ambiguous Map method with minimal #35631
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update docker container to mcr #35630
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35619
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0-rc1
  • Add installer artifacts to source build intermediate #35615
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix 'HeadOutlet' getting trimmed away for Blazor WebAssembly prerendered apps after publish #35419
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Update docker container to mcr #35623
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35617
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1

    area-security, community-contribution

  • Add support for Results extension point #35571
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35593

    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1

    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Cancel the token when it's created after an Abort/Disconnect #35566
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Delay closing SignalR connections on shutdown #34438
    area-signalr
  • RC1 Port: Add FailureReasons (#35425) #35529
    area-security, ask-mode
  • [SPA] Ensure spawned NPM processes are terminated when the dotnet process is ungracefully terminated #35591
    area-runtime
  • Add Support for `DateOnly` & `TimeOnly` for `SupplyParameterFromQuery` #35569
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35576
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add support for Results extension point #35574
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
